Avant-Garde, Classical Genre Twentieth-century American monologist and humorist Lord Buckley was born this date in 1906 in Tuolumne, California. Alexander Nevsky (1938) On this date in 1242 Alexander Nevsky defeated the Teutonic Knights in the Battle on the Ice, saving Russia from invasion. The victory inspired Sergei Eisenstein's 1938 film with musical score by Sergei Prokofiev.
